title: Freelance Web Developer
description: In my freelance role, I analyze client needs, install websites, and turn Figma designs into user-friendly, responsive websites. I ensure optimal design for various screen sizes, follow SEO standards for better search results, and increase the effectiveness of digital marketing through company profile sites. I also create user-friendly admin panels, allowing clients to easily customize website content and various other types of application systems.

title: Internship at Garuda Cyber Indonesia
description: During my internship, I actively collaborated with the Application and Data Teams to create the "Garuda Kasir Landing Page" website application. In this role, I played a key part in the development of the application, focusing on efficient product for the company.

title: Assist.id
description: Focused on creating and enhancing user-facing features to ensure a seamless and engaging experience on the Assist.id platform. Leveraged skills in frontend technologies to design responsive interfaces and improve visual elements. Collaborated closely with the design and backend teams to deliver features that align with project goals and user needs. Key accomplishments include optimizing front-end performance, implementing best practices for responsive design, and maintaining code quality standards to enhance user engagement and accessibility.
